extension.description: An OpenAI ChatGPT API client for VSCode
command.editing.continueInContext.title: Markdown Copilot: Continue in context
command.editing.continueInContext.import: Error occurred while importing "{0}" in [{1}]({1}).Please check if the file path, etc. is correct.
command.editing.indentQuote.title: Markdown Copilot: Indent Quote Line
command.editing.outdentQuote.title: Markdown Copilot: Outdent Quote Line
command.editing.titleActiveContext.title: Markdown Copilot: Title active context
command.editing.nameAndSaveAs.title: Markdown Copilot: Name and Save As...
config.decorations.inactiveContextOpacit: Controls the opacity of inactive context lines, `0.0` is completely transparent, while a value of `1.0` is completely opaque.
config.instructions.nameMessage.descript: Controls the Copilot's behavior, allowing changes to its file naming instructions.
config.instructions.namePathFormat.descr: Can specify the path format when `Name and Save As...`. The format is referenced from `Name Message`.
config.instructions.systemMessage.descri: Controls the Copilot's behavior, allowing changes to its personality or specific behavior instructions.
config.instructions.titleMessage.descrip: Controls the Copilot's behavior, allowing changes to its title instructions for the active context.
config.openAI.apiKey.description: Your OpenAI or Azure OpenAI API key. Can be obtained from [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) or [Azure OpenAI Quickstart](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/quickstart).
config.openAI.azureBaseUrl.description: Can specify the Azure Base URL, or leave it empty if not using Azure. The URL format is `https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/{deployment-id}/completions?api-version={api-version}`. Refer to the [Azure OpenAI Service REST API reference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#completions) for details.
config.openAI.model.description: Can specify the models listed in [Models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/models).
config.options.temperature.description: Can specify a value between `0.0` and `1.0`. Higher values like `0.8` will make the output more random, while lower values like `0.2` will make it more focused and deterministic. [FAQ](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-generation/how-should-i-set-the-temperature-parameter) helps to determine the value.
